sent.orig: The depth from waterline to vessel's bottom is called daft.
sent.trans: 水线到船顶的浅度便吃火。

sent.orig: No company has ever been saddled with such a daft management structure in consequence.
sent.trans: 没有一家公司因此负载着如此笨拙的管理架构。

sent.orig: Tobin was a genius, but the Tobin tax was probably his one daft idea.
sent.trans: 托宾是一位天才，但托宾税大概是他唯一的蠢主意。

sent.orig: He's gone a bit daft (in the head), ie He has become slightly insane.
Yet for company employees this is not an option, no matter how staggeringly daft the course.
sent.trans: 不过对企业员工来说，这却不是一条可取之道，不论这课程傻到了什么程度。
